Author: Alright#0419
Content: An example of a good use for a streamer chain is something we hope to make for LABS. If all goes well, we'll have a "meta" chain that has every single chain that ever existed in the cluster for history purposes

Author: Alright#0419
Content: the way LABS works, it's possible to lose portions of it's history if all copies of a given fungible chain cease to exist

Author: Alright#0419
Content: some fungible chains will be one time use, so it's important to us that these chains don't just become a block box of "some coins went in, some coins came out"
